metadata.title: CVE-2018-17235 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: The function mp4v2::impl::MP4Track::FinishSdtp() in mp4track.cpp inlibmp4v2 2.1.0 mishandles compatibleBrand while processing a crafted mp4file, which leads to a heap-based buffer over-read, causing denial ofservice.

criterions.comment: mp4v2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
